name: Cloud Boucle Lounge Chair
description: A sculptural lounge chair upholstered in luxurious cream boucle fabric with a curved organic silhouette. The low-profile design and gentle curves create an inviting cocoon perfect for intimate reading corners or as a statement piece flanking a fireplace. Its neutral palette makes it incredibly versatile, complementing both warm wood tones and cool metal accents. Pairs beautifully with textured throws and understated side tables.

name: Leather Sling Directors Chair
description: A refined take on the classic directors chair featuring rich cognac leather slung over a sleek black metal frame. The minimal design language and compact footprint make it ideal for workspaces, entryways, or as dining seating in smaller spaces. The natural patina develops character over time. Works exceptionally well in spaces with exposed brick, concrete floors, or alongside industrial shelving.

name: Curved Velvet Loveseat
description: An architectural loveseat with a distinctive curved back upholstered in deep emerald velvet atop brass-finished legs. The semi-circular silhouette creates visual drama and encourages intimate conversation. Perfect as a focal point in living rooms or positioned elegantly in bay windows. The rich jewel tone adds sophistication to neutral palettes and pairs wonderfully with marble surfaces, gold accents, and botanical elements.

name: Minimalist Ash Wood Bench
description: A beautifully simple bench crafted from solid ash wood with clean lines and visible wood grain. The slender profile and backless design make it incredibly versatile - use it as entryway seating, a coffee table alternative, extra dining seating, or bedroom bench. The warm neutral tone complements any color scheme and the honest materiality brings organic warmth to minimalist interiors.

name: Travertine Oval Coffee Table
description: A sculptural coffee table featuring a thick oval travertine top with natural pitting and veining resting on a curved pedestal base. The organic stone texture and soft oval shape create a focal point that feels both ancient and contemporary. Its low profile works beautifully in compact living rooms while the neutral earth tones complement warm and cool palettes alike. Pairs exceptionally with boucle seating, brass accents, and greenery.

name: Glass and Brass Nesting Tables
description: A set of two nesting tables with tempered glass tops and slender brass-finished metal frames. The transparent surfaces maintain visual lightness while the warm metallic legs add a touch of luxury. Perfect for flexible entertaining or tucked beside sofas and chairs. The nested design saves space when not in use. Complements velvet seating, marble accessories, and brings sparkle to darker interiors.

name: Live Edge Walnut Console
description: A striking console table showcasing a single-slab walnut top with preserved live edge and rich grain patterns on geometric black metal legs. The contrast between organic wood character and industrial base creates visual intrigue. Ideal for entryways, behind sofas, or as a media console. The dark wood brings warmth and grounds spaces with lighter palettes. Style with ceramic vessels, books, and sculptural objects.

name: Marble and Oak Round Side Table
description: A refined side table pairing a white marble top with tapered oak legs. The contrast between cool stone and warm wood creates balanced elegance. The compact round footprint fits easily beside chairs and sofas without overwhelming. The marble surface is perfect for displaying small plants, table lamps, or morning coffee. Works beautifully in Scandinavian, modern, and transitional interiors.

name: Caned Rattan Media Console
description: A beautiful media console featuring caned rattan door fronts set in an oak frame atop angled wood legs. The natural texture and warm tones bring organic softness while providing concealed storage for media components. Ventilated design allows for electronics while the textured doors add visual interest. Perfect for living rooms seeking warmth and works wonderfully with plants, woven textiles, and natural materials.

name: Modular Oak Shelving System
description: A ladder-style shelving unit in solid oak with five open shelves offering generous display and storage. The leaning design creates architectural interest and the visible wood grain brings warmth. Ideal for books, plants, ceramics, and collected objects. The open shelving creates breathing room in minimalist spaces. Perfect against empty walls, in home offices, or living areas needing functional beauty.

name: Black Steel and Marble Bar Cart
description: A sophisticated two-tier bar cart combining white marble shelves with a matte black steel frame and brass-toned wheels. The mixed materials create luxe contrast while the compact footprint fits easily into living or dining areas. Perfect for bar service, plant display, or as a mobile side table. The marble surfaces add elegance while wheels provide flexibility. Pairs beautifully with brass accents and velvet seating.

name: Arched Brass Floor Lamp
description: A classic arc floor lamp with adjustable brass arm and white linen drum shade. The sweeping curve allows light to hover over seating areas without requiring side tables. The warm brass finish adds warmth and the generous shade provides soft ambient light perfect for reading. Ideal positioned behind sofas or beside chairs. Complements velvet, leather, and works in both warm and cool color schemes.

name: Japanese Paper Pendant Light
description: A sculptural pendant lamp made from handcrafted washi paper over bamboo ribbing creating an organic sphere that casts beautiful diffused light. The natural materials and soft glow create calming ambiance. Perfect over dining tables, in bedrooms, or clustered in entryways. The minimal aesthetic works beautifully in Scandinavian, Japanese, and modern spaces. Brings softness to harder materials.

name: Ceramic Table Lamp with Linen Shade
description: A sculptural table lamp featuring a hand-thrown terracotta base with organic curves and matte glaze paired with a natural linen shade. The warm earth tones and handcrafted quality bring artisanal character to side tables and consoles. The soft linen shade creates warm ambient light perfect for bedrooms and living spaces. Pairs beautifully with natural wood, greenery, and neutral textiles.

name: Industrial Black Task Lamp
description: A functional task lamp with matte black metal construction, adjustable arm, and focused directional light. The utilitarian design and sleek profile make it perfect for desks, workspaces, or bedside reading. The matte finish reduces glare and the minimal aesthetic disappears when not in use. Works in industrial, modern, and minimal interiors. Pairs well with wood desks and metal accents.

name: Fiddle Leaf Fig in Ceramic Planter
description: A lush fiddle leaf fig tree with broad sculptural leaves in a minimalist white ceramic planter. The dramatic foliage adds vertical interest and organic life to empty corners, beside windows, or flanking furniture. The large leaves create architectural presence while purifying air. Perfect for bright spaces with indirect light. Brings life to minimalist, modern, and Scandinavian interiors.

name: Monstera Deliciosa Floor Plant
description: A mature monstera with iconic split leaves in a terracotta planter. The dramatic foliage brings tropical vibes and works as a statement piece or grouped with other plants. The warm terracotta adds earthiness while the large leaves create dynamic shadows. Thrives in medium light and adds lushness to living spaces, bedrooms, or offices. Perfect for bohemian, modern, and eclectic styles.

name: Snake Plant Trio in Minimal Pot
description: A trio of snake plants with striking vertical leaves in a cylindrical gray ceramic pot. The architectural form and low-maintenance nature make it perfect for any space. The vertical lines add height to surfaces without overwhelming. Thrives in low light making it ideal for offices, bedrooms, or corners. The minimal planter complements contemporary and Scandinavian interiors.

name: Pothos Hanging Plant
description: A cascading pothos plant with heart-shaped variegated leaves in a white ceramic hanging planter. The trailing vines add vertical interest and soften hard edges when hung from ceilings or placed on high shelves. Very low maintenance and thrives in various light conditions. Perfect for adding layers and bringing life to upper spaces. Works in bohemian, modern, and eclectic interiors.

name: Handwoven Jute Basket Set
description: A set of three natural jute baskets with handles in graduated sizes. The organic texture and warm neutral tone add softness and practical storage for blankets, magazines, or plants. The handwoven quality brings artisanal character. Perfect on floors beside sofas, in bathrooms, or for organizing shelving. Works beautifully in Scandinavian, bohemian, and organic modern spaces.

name: Ceramic Sculptural Vase
description: A hand-thrown ceramic vase with organic curves and matte cream glaze. The sculptural form stands beautifully alone or with dried grasses and flowers. The neutral color and interesting silhouette make it a versatile accent for consoles, shelving, or dining tables. The handcrafted quality adds character. Perfect for modern, Scandinavian, and minimal interiors seeking organic accents.

name: Brass Decorative Tray
description: An oval brass tray with raised edges and hammered texture. Perfect for corralling items on coffee tables, ottomans, or consoles. The warm metallic adds a touch of luxury and reflects light beautifully. Use for styling candles, books, or as a bar service piece. The timeless material works across styles from mid-century to modern glam. Pairs with marble, velvet, and glass.

name: Marble Bookends Pair
description: A pair of solid marble bookends with natural veining and polished finish. The substantial weight holds books elegantly while adding sophisticated accent to shelving. The mixed black and white marble creates visual interest. Perfect for styling bookshelves, desks, or consoles. The natural stone brings organic luxury. Works beautifully in modern, minimal, and transitional spaces.

name: Handmade Ceramic Bowl Collection
description: A set of three handmade ceramic bowls in varying sizes with organic shapes and earth-toned glazes. The imperfect beauty and warm colors add artisanal character to coffee tables, consoles, or shelving. Use for keys, jewelry, or as sculptural objects. The handcrafted quality brings uniqueness. Perfect for organic modern, bohemian, and wabi-sabi inspired interiors.

name: Abstract Line Drawing Print
description: A large-scale abstract line drawing in black ink on white paper, professionally framed in slim black wood. The flowing organic lines create visual movement and sophistication. The minimal palette works universally and the vertical format is perfect above consoles, in narrow wall spaces, or in gallery walls. Brings artistic interest without overwhelming. Ideal for modern and minimal interiors.

name: Vintage Botanical Print Set
description: A set of four vintage-inspired botanical prints featuring detailed plant illustrations on aged paper, each in matching oak frames. The scientific yet artistic quality adds sophisticated nature element. Perfect for creating gallery walls, styling dining rooms, or adding interest to home offices. The warm tones and organic subject matter work beautifully in traditional, transitional, and organic modern spaces.

name: Round Brass Mirror
description: A circular mirror with thin brass frame that creates a refined focal point while reflecting light and opening spaces. The warm metallic adds luxury and the simple silhouette works in various contexts. Perfect above consoles, in entryways, over mantels, or in gallery walls. The reflective quality brightens rooms. Works beautifully in modern, glam, and mid-century interiors.

name: Oversized Abstract Canvas
description: A large abstract canvas featuring bold navy brushstrokes with gold leaf accents on cream background. The substantial size creates dramatic focal point perfect above sofas, beds, or in dining rooms. The sophisticated color palette adds depth while the gold brings luxury. The horizontal format anchors furniture arrangements. Ideal for modern, transitional, and eclectic spaces seeking statement art.

name: Handwoven Jute Area Rug
description: A large handwoven jute rug with natural texture and subtle braided pattern. The organic material and neutral color ground spaces while adding warmth underfoot. The natural fibers are durable and the texture hides wear well. Perfect for layering under coffee tables, defining seating areas, or in dining rooms. Works beautifully in coastal, Scandinavian, and organic modern spaces.

name: Vintage Persian Runner
description: A vintage-inspired Persian runner with intricate medallion pattern in rich reds, navy, and cream. The elongated format is perfect for hallways, in front of sofas, or layered over larger neutral rugs. The traditional pattern adds character and the complex design hides traffic wear. Brings warmth and history to modern, eclectic, and transitional spaces seeking depth.

name: Geometric Wool Rug
description: A hand-tufted wool rug featuring bold geometric patterns in black, white, and gray. The graphic design creates strong visual interest while the neutral palette remains versatile. The soft wool pile adds comfort and the pattern grounds modern furniture. Perfect for living rooms, bedrooms, or offices. Works beautifully in modern, Scandinavian, and minimalist interiors seeking graphic elements.

name: Sculptural Glass Table Lamp
description: An art glass table lamp with organic bubble texture and brass fittings creating light-refracting beauty. The sculptural base becomes a focal point during day and creates ambient glow at night. The transparent quality keeps visual lightness while adding luxury. Perfect for consoles, nightstands, or side tables. Pairs beautifully with marble, velvet, and metallic accents in modern and glam interiors.

name: Cane Back Dining Chair
description: A refined dining chair featuring a caned back panel set in an oak frame with upholstered seat. The mix of materials creates visual interest and textural depth. The breathable cane back adds comfort while the neutral palette works with various table styles. Perfect for dining rooms or as desk seating. The organic materials bring warmth to modern and Scandinavian interiors.

name: Macrame Wall Hanging
description: A handcrafted macrame wall hanging with intricate knotwork and flowing fringe. The natural cotton fiber and dimensional texture add bohemian warmth and softness to walls. Perfect above beds, in living areas, or creating focal points on empty walls. The neutral color works universally and the handmade quality brings artisanal character. Ideal for bohemian, coastal, and organic modern styles.

name: Aged Brass Candlestick Set
description: A set of three brass candlesticks in varying heights with naturally aged patina. The warm metallic and varying heights create dynamic table displays. Perfect for styling dining tables, mantels, or consoles. The aged finish brings vintage character while the simple forms remain timeless. Works beautifully with marble, wood, and adds warmth to modern and eclectic interiors.
